column2: Choose a Vassal to make into an autonomous tributary to reduce your Imperial Inefficiency. Be aware that the Autonomous Vassal might choose to leave on succession.
Make this Vassal into an Autonomous Tributary to reduce your Imperial Inefficiency. Be aware that the Autonomous Vassal might choose to leave on succession.
Make this Autonomous Vassal lose their autonomy and return to being a regular Vassal. This will give you more direct control but increase your Imperial Inefficiency.
Ask your Liege to give you autonomy to govern your provinces as you see fit.
Ask your Liege to take you back into the Empire as a regular Vassal.
Put your plot into motion and attempt to place yourself on the imperial throne
Put your plot into motion and attempt to place yourself on the imperial throne
Put your plot into motion and attempt to place yourself on the imperial throne
Put your plot into motion and attempt to place yourself on the imperial throne
Reform your Court so that you may get rid of superfluous Minor Titles and Imperial Inefficiency
Leave your self-imposed seclusion and return to your duties as ruler
Create an elite body of soldiers to protect your family and aid you in war
Call a skilled eunuch to your court.
Call a skilled eunuch to your court.
Declare that eunuchs are an integral part of the Imperial bureaucracy. This will remove penalties for hiring eunuchs but may have an immediate backlash
Reform the Imperial Bureaucracy to allow for more efficient tax collection
Reform the Imperial Armies to allow for more efficient deployment
Print more money for the Imperial Treasury. This will cause inflation and worsen future tax revenue.
The AI will form empires at the standard rate
The AI will automatically gain an empire when they have at least 3 kingdoms none of which use gavelkind or electives
Used the Guard to Massacre Civilians
Gather enough support to oust the Emperor and place yourself on the throne
This person has experience serving in an elite Imperial Guard
This person has experience commanding an elite Imperial Guard
This Emperor has decided to retire to private life to escape the pressures of governing
This man has been made a eunuch to ensure a superior education and better opportunities at court
